member.summary: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection(Of T) class that contains elements copied from the specified collection.
member.param: collection: The collection from which the elements are copied.
member.exception: The collection parameter cannot be null.

member.name: M:MvvmHelpers.ObservableRangeCollection`1.AddRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0},System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction)
member.summary: Adds the elements of the specified collection to the end of the ObservableCollection(Of T).

member.name: M:MvvmHelpers.ObservableRangeCollection`1.RemoveRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0},System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction)
member.summary: Removes the first occurence of each item in the specified collection from ObservableCollection(Of T). NOTE: with notificationMode = Remove, removed items starting index is not set because items are not guaranteed to be consecutive.

member.summary: Clears the current collection and replaces it with the specified item.

member.summary: Clears the current collection and replaces it with the specified collection.
